hero.title: Discourse Plugin Marketplace
hero.subtitle: Purchase premium Discourse plugins with permanent license and time-limited maintenance. Zero intrusive authorization, powered by GitHub App.

home.title: Discourse Plugin Marketplace
home.subtitle: Purchase premium Discourse plugins with permanent licenses and professional maintenance. Zero intrusive authorization, powered by GitHub.
home.featuresSubtitle: We provide the tools and infrastructure you need to scale your online presence securely and reliably
home.feature1Description: Your account is protected with secure authentication including optional 2FA support.
home.feature2Description: Built on modern tech stack, providing blazing fast access and smooth user experience.
home.feature3Description: Support for multiple payment methods and languages, serving users worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.subtitle: Register your account in seconds and start building your online presence

features.title: Why GitStore?
features.permanentLicenseDesc: One-time purchase, use forever. Your plugin never expires.
features.timeLimitedMaintenanceDesc: Get updates for 12 months. Plugin works permanently, updates controlled by time.
features.zeroIntrusiveDesc: No license check in plugin code. Clean and simple integration.
features.githubPoweredDesc: Secure authorization via GitHub App. No manual token management.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse plugins and complete payment via Stripe, PayPal, or Alipay
howItWorks.step2Desc: System grants your GitHub account access to private plugin repository
howItWorks.step3Desc: Clone repository to your Discourse server using provided git URL
howItWorks.step4Desc: Get updates for 12 months. Plugin works permanently, updates controlled by time

plugins.title: Featured Plugins
plugins.subtitle: Browse our carefully curated collection of premium Discourse plugins to enhance your community
plugins.noPluginsDesc: Try adjusting your search or browse other categories

pluginDetail.installationNote: After purchase, you'll receive immediate access to the private repository

dashboard.title: My Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your plugins, orders, and licenses

licenses.title: My Licenses
licenses.subtitle: Manage your plugin licenses and maintenance periods
licenses.noLicensesDesc: You don't have any licenses yet. Licenses are generated automatically after purchase.

licenseDetail.activatedDesc: Your license has been activated and a collaborator invitation has been sent to your GitHub account.
licenseDetail.step1Desc: We've sent you a collaborator invitation to access the private repository. Please check your GitHub notifications and accept it.
licenseDetail.step1CheckDesc: Make sure you're logged into the GitHub account you used during purchase:
licenseDetail.step1FindDesc: Look for an invitation from the repository owner for:
licenseDetail.step1AcceptDesc: Click "Accept invitation" button to gain access to the private repository.
licenseDetail.invitationNoteDesc: You must accept the invitation using the GitHub account used during purchase, otherwise the license cannot be verified.
licenseDetail.step2Desc: After accepting the invitation, you can access the private repository:
licenseDetail.troubleCheck1: You're logged into the correct GitHub account:
licenseDetail.troubleCheck2: You have accepted the repository invitation
licenseDetail.troubleCheck3: Git is using correct authentication (SSH key or HTTPS token)
licenseDetail.step3Desc: Follow the README.md instructions in the repository to install and configure the plugin.
licenseDetail.step3Note: Detailed installation and configuration steps are provided in the repository documentation.
licenseDetail.maintenanceDesc1: Your license includes maintenance and code access service, valid until
licenseDetail.expiryWarning: After maintenance period expires, your GitHub repository access will be automatically removed. It's recommended that before expiry:
licenseDetail.suggestionBackup: Download and backup the code locally
licenseDetail.suggestionRenew: Or renew maintenance to continue receiving updates and support
licenseDetail.helpIntro: If you have any questions or encounter difficulties:
licenseDetail.faq1Question: Why can't I see the private repository?
licenseDetail.faq1Check1: You have accepted the GitHub repository invitation
licenseDetail.faq1Check2: You're using the GitHub account from purchase:
licenseDetail.faq2Item1: Your GitHub repository access will be automatically removed
licenseDetail.faq2Item2: You cannot access or download new code
licenseDetail.faq2Item3: But code you've already downloaded can be used permanently
licenseDetail.faq2Item4: It's recommended to download and backup code before expiry
licenseDetail.faq3Question: Can I change my GitHub account?
licenseDetail.faq3Answer: The license is bound to the GitHub account used during purchase:
licenseDetail.faq3Contact: . If you need to change accounts, please contact technical support.
licenseDetail.faq4Answer: Click the "Renew Maintenance" button below, or the system will automatically send renewal reminder emails 30 days before expiry.

orders.title: My Orders
orders.subtitle: View and manage all your purchase records
orders.noOrdersDesc: You haven't placed any orders yet. Browse our plugin store!
